songs.title: Beparwah
songs.lyrics:
[Hook: Devika Chawla]
Ankh beparwah naal laayi
Luk luk rona pai gaya
Sukh chain te neend ganwaayi
Luk luk rona pai gaya haaye
Akh beparwah naal layi... yeah!
Luk luk rona pai gaya... haaye

[Verse 1 : Bohemia]
Jado raat lage savera
Roshan lage hannera
Umeedan ne taqdeera
Gallan karan tasveera
Pucchan jede sawaal
Ohna da jawaab
Kithen de jo mainu yaar
O ho kise nu yaar vike gaya
Mainu chhad ke vo kise de naal
Tu sukhi hon nu ho sakda
Par be mainu lagda
Ni das ki vo tainu mere tarah kahanda billo
Ni das mainu ki vo tainu meri tarah rakhda sukhi
Das mainu ki vo tenu meri tarah pyaar kare
Raata nu jaage tera intazaar kare
Note lutaye tenu duniya ghumaye Billo
Yaara nu yaar tere variyan te vaar kareay
Das mainu ki vo tainu rajj ke khilawe roti?
Das mainu ki vo tainu leke dawe heere moti?
Aur jado jhoote yaaro ne chhad dita saath
Ki odo Planet M Charts te see ohdi number 1 CD?
Das mainu ki main tere pyaar ch gawaya nahi?
Jaane vi kaun ni tu pucche mera saaya nahi
Teri khusi ch meri khusi main ae socheya si
Par tenu chhad ke vi chain maine paaya nahi

[Bridge]
Ankh beparwah naal laayi
Luk luk rona pai gaya
Yeah, yeah

Phone tainu milawa
Mila ke kaat dewa
Road te mod tera lende lende chad dawa
Bhangg de 3-4 peewa main Cigar roz
Soch na main tere picche bhangg pini chad dawa

[Verse 2 : Bohemia]
Ve saanu janma de lod nahi
Aapa ek janam 'ch ajnabi
Tu pale vi vapas ajnabi
Sanu variyan di lod nahi
Aapa pyaar paaya jiven
Ek dooje naal dushmani
Yaad hai kehndi si tu sapnya da raja mainu
Rata nu mapeyan to chup milan aaja mainu
Kiven jaan bach ke teri gallan ch main phansaiya
Soch ke aapte aanda hassa mainu
Loki mudd mudd dekh tamasa mainu
Yaad hun den dilasha mainu
Tu vi meri tarah dil dena chhad degi
Je mere dekhi beeti hota andaza tenu

[Hook: Devika Chawla]
Akh beparwah naal laayi
Luk luk rona pai gaya
Sukh chain te neend ganwaayi
Luk luk rona pai gaya haaye
Akh beparwah naal laayi
Luk luk rona pai gaya haaye
